title: VLESS Config Generator
subtitle: Create personalized link for configuration generation
copy_link_desc: Copy this link and send it to the user:
instruction1: 1. Fill in the main parameters (type, UUID, server, port)
instruction3: 3. Click "Generate Link" to create a personalized link
instruction4: 4. Send the resulting link to the user - it contains all necessary parameters
qr_instructions: Scan the QR code with your VLESS client to import configuration:
client_instruction1: 1. Scan the QR code with your VLESS client (NekoBox, v2rayN, etc.)
client_instruction2: 2. Or copy the VLESS URL above manually
client_instruction3: 3. Alternatively, download the JSON configuration file
validation_error: Please fill in the required fields (type and UUID)
